thread.title: Former U.S. Treasury Senior Policy Advisor Joins GIBC Digital to Lead Regulatory & Compliance

author: cnbc.com
title: Former U.S. Treasury Senior Policy Advisor Joins GIBC Digital to Lead Regulatory & Compliance

organizations.name: gibc digital to lead regulatory & compliance
advisory board of turning rock partners

text:
NEW YORK, Global management consulting firm GIBC Digital announced today that it hired Amy Poster to lead its Regulatory & Compliance Group in the United States.
Poster will be responsible for regulatory and compliance risk-management programs, regulatory and compliance reporting for broker/dealers and hedge funds, internal audit, controls, and the implementation of risk-technology solutions.
Greg Wood, GIBC Digital CEO, said, "Amy offers invaluable industry experience, expertise, and a track record of results to support clients as they embrace digital transformation in a highly regulated world. She brings real-world know-how to our clients to help them mitigate threats and turn challenges into a competitive edge in the process."
Poster is a thought-leader in financial services and is regularly published in leading media, such as Institutional Investor, Alpha, Money Management Intelligence, and the Global Association of Risk Professionals (GARP) Risk News magazines. Poster is on the Advisory Board of Turning Rock Partners, a private-equity hedge fund. She is a member of the 100 Women in Finance Advisory Council and holds an MBA in Financial Management, with distinction, from Pace University.
Prior to joining GIBC Digital, Poster was a Senior Policy Advisor at the U.S. Department of Treasury, Office of the Special Inspector General-TARP (SIGTARP). There, she oversaw financial markets and domestic policy, leading critical audits on TARP recipients and federal inter-agency investigations.
Poster commented that she is "excited to join the talented team at GIBC Digital and tackle complex digital challenges across a wide range of business objectives."
ABOUT GIBC Digital

Our team takes a multi-disciplinary approach to providing end-to-end services spanning strategy, business process, people, organizational change, and technology. We can help you evolve to thrive in a digital world, where customers expect every company to be a technology company. To learn more, visit us at gibcdigital.com.
